00055 #define MAIN_BINDING        0

00057     PagingLandScapeOptions *PagingLandScapePageRenderable::mOpt;
00058     String PagingLandScapePageRenderable::mType = "PagingLandScapePageBillBoard";

00060     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00061     PagingLandScapePageRenderable::PagingLandScapePageRenderable(PagingLandScapePageManager *pageMgr, const String& name, const unsigned int pageX, const unsigned int pageZ, 
00062         const AxisAlignedBox &bounds) :
00063         Renderable(), 
00064             MovableObject(name),
00065             mParent(pageMgr),
00066             mX(pageX),
00067             mZ(pageZ),
00068             mBounds(bounds),
00069             mCurrVertexes (0),
00070             mCurrIndexes  (0)
00071     {
00072             // No shadow projection
00073         MovableObject::mCastShadows = false;
00074         // Default query flags to top bit so users can exclude it if they wish
00075         //MovableObject::mQueryFlags = SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_QUERY_MASK;
00076 
00077         // Setup render op
00078             mCurrIndexes = new IndexData();
00079 
00080         const unsigned int Numtiles = mParent->getOptions()->NumTiles + 1;
00081         const size_t new_length = ((Numtiles - 1) * (Numtiles - 1) * 2 * 2 * 2);
00082         mCurrIndexes->indexCount = new_length;
00083         mCurrIndexes->indexStart = 0;
00084         mCurrIndexes->indexBuffer = 
00085             HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createIndexBuffer(
00086             HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_16BIT,
00087             new_length, 
00088             HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00089 
00090 
00091             mCurrVertexes = new VertexData();
00092             mCurrVertexes->vertexStart = 0;
00093             mCurrVertexes->vertexCount =  Numtiles * Numtiles + 1;
00094  
00095 
00096             // Vertex declaration
00097             VertexDeclaration* decl = mCurrVertexes->vertexDeclaration;
00098             VertexBufferBinding* bind = mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding;
00099 
00100         // Vertex buffer #1, position
00101         // positions
00102         size_t offset = 0;
00103         decl->addElement(MAIN_BINDING, 0, VET_FLOAT3, VES_POSITION);
00104         offset += VertexElement::getTypeSize (VET_FLOAT3);       
00105         decl->addElement(MAIN_BINDING, offset, VET_FLOAT2, VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 0);
00106         offset += VertexElement::getTypeSize(VET_FLOAT2);
00107         
00108         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton ().createVertexBuffer(
00109                                                     decl->getVertexSize (MAIN_BINDING), 
00110                                                     mCurrVertexes->vertexCount,
00111                                                     HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00112 
00113         bind->setBinding(MAIN_BINDING, vbuf);
00114         
00115 
00116     }
00117 
00118     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119     PagingLandScapePageRenderable::~PagingLandScapePageRenderable()
00120     {
00121             delete mCurrVertexes;
00122             delete mCurrIndexes;
00123 
00124         mMaterial.setNull();
00125     }

00127     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00128     void PagingLandScapePageRenderable::load()
00129     {
00130        
00131         // case renderable was queued before page was unloaded
00132         // when loaded, page exists no more.
00133 
00134         VertexDeclaration* decl = mCurrVertexes->vertexDeclaration;
00135         VertexBufferBinding* bind = mCurrVertexes->vertexBufferBinding;
00136 
00137         const VertexElement* poselem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_POSITION);
00138         const VertexElement* texelem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES, 0);
00139         
00140 
00141         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vVertices = bind->getBuffer(MAIN_BINDING);             
00142         uchar* pMain = static_cast<uchar*>(vVertices->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00143 
00144         const unsigned int Numtiles = mParent->getOptions()->NumTiles + 1;
00145 
00146         const Real invpagesizeX = 1.0f / ((Numtiles - 1) * mParent->getOptions()->world_width);
00147         const Real invpagesizeZ = 1.0f / ((Numtiles  - 1)*  mParent->getOptions()->world_height);
00148 
00149         const Real texOffsetX = mX * (Numtiles  - 1) * invpagesizeX;
00150         const Real texOffsetZ = mZ * (Numtiles  - 1) * invpagesizeZ;
00151 
00152 
00153         const Real scale_x = mOpt->scale.x * (mOpt->TileSize - 1);
00154         const Real scale_z = mOpt->scale.z * (mOpt->TileSize - 1);
00155         unsigned int i, j;
00156         for (j = 0; j < Numtiles ; j ++)
00157         {
00158             // This allow to reuse the variables in the loop
00159             const Real h_pos = j * scale_z;
00160             const Real Tex_pos = texOffsetZ + j  * invpagesizeZ;
00161 
00162                     for (i = 0; i < Numtiles; i ++)
00163             {
00164                 // vertices are relative to the scene node
00165                
00166                 float *pPos;
00167 
00168                 poselem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMain, &pPos);
00169 
00170                             *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (i * scale_x);        //X
00171                             *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (0.0);                    //Y
00172                             *pPos   = static_cast <float> (h_pos);          //Z
00173 
00174                 float *pTex;
00175                 texelem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMain, &pTex);
00176 
00177                 *pTex++ = static_cast <float> (texOffsetX + i  * invpagesizeX);
00178                 *pTex = static_cast <float> (Tex_pos);
00179                 
00180                 pMain += vVertices->getVertexSize ();
00181 
00182             }
00183             }
00184             // Unlock the buffers
00185         vVertices->unlock();
00186 
00187 
00188         ushort* pIdx = static_cast<ushort*>(mCurrIndexes->indexBuffer->lock(0, 
00189                                             mCurrIndexes->indexBuffer->getSizeInBytes(), 
00190                                             HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00191         unsigned int height_count = 0;
00192         unsigned int NumIndexes = 0;
00193         for (j = 0; j < Numtiles - 1; j ++)
00194         {
00195                     for (i = 0; i < Numtiles - 1; i ++)
00196             {
00197                 // Indexes
00198                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count);            NumIndexes++;                
00199                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count + Numtiles); NumIndexes++; 
00200                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + 1    + height_count);            NumIndexes++;   
00201                 
00202                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count + Numtiles); NumIndexes++; 
00203                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + 1    + height_count + Numtiles); NumIndexes++; 
00204                 *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + 1    + height_count);            NumIndexes++; 
00205            
00206             }
00207             height_count += Numtiles;
00208             }
00209 
00210         mCurrIndexes->indexBuffer->unlock();
00211 
00212         assert (NumIndexes < mCurrIndexes->indexCount);
00213 
00214 
00215         const Real max = 
00216             mParent->getSceneManager()->getData2DManager()->getMaxHeight(mX, 
00217                                                                       mZ);
00218        
00219             // Calculate the bounding box for this renderable
00220             mBounds.setExtents(0.0f, 
00221                            0.0f, 
00222                            0.0f, 
00223                            0.0f + Numtiles * scale_x,
00224                            max, 
00225                            0.0f + Numtiles * scale_z);
00226 
00227         assert (mParentNode);
00228         mCenter = mBounds.getCenter()  + mParentNode->getWorldPosition();
00229             mWorldBoundingSphere.setCenter(mCenter);
00230             mWorldBoundingSphere.setRadius(mBounds.getMaximum().length());
00231 
00232         mParentNode->needUpdate();
00233 
00234 
00235         MovableObject::setRenderQueueGroup(mParent->getSceneManager()->getPageManager()->getRenderQueueGroupID());
00236 
00237     }
00238     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00239     void PagingLandScapePageRenderable::_notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam)
00240     {
00241             if (static_cast<PagingLandScapeCamera*> (cam)->isVisible (mBounds))
00242         {
00243            mVisible = true;
00244            MovableObject::_notifyCurrentCamera(cam);
00245         }
00246         else
00247            mVisible = false;
00248     }
00249     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00250     void PagingLandScapePageRenderable::_updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue)
00251     {           
00252         queue->addRenderable(this);
00253     }
00254     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00255     Technique* PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getTechnique(void) const
00256     {
00257             return mMaterial->getBestTechnique ();
00258     }
00259     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00260     const LightList& PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getLights(void) const
00261     {
00262         return MovableObject::getParentSceneNode()->findLights(this->getBoundingRadius());
00263     }
00264     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00265     Real PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getSquaredViewDepth(const Camera* cam) const
00266     {   
00267             // Use squared length to avoid square root
00268             return (mCenter - 
00269             cam->getDerivedPosition ()).squaredLength();
00270     }
00271 
00272     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00273     Real PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getBoundingRadius(void) const
00274     {
00275             return mWorldBoundingSphere.getRadius();
00276     }
00277     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00278     void PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op)
00279     {
00280         //setup indexes for vertices and uvs...
00281         op.useIndexes = true;
00282         op.operationType = RenderOperation::OT_TRIANGLE_LIST;           
00283         op.vertexData = mCurrVertexes;
00284         op.indexData = mCurrIndexes;
00285 
00286     }

00288     void PagingLandScapePageRenderable::getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const
00289     {
00290         *xform = mParentNode->_getFullTransform();
00291     }

00296     }
00297     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------

00301     }
